pullRequest.title: [gRPC] Any data field support
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Fixes #21146
Approach

Use Ballerina anydata
Serialization and deserialization happens through a byte array

Remarks
As described in [1], the any data support for any message type. In Ballerina, these messages are maps to records. However, currently, Ballerina does not have mechanism to serialize and deserialize records for bytes. Therefore, actual usage of any data can be achieved after the support of this serialization and deserialization support.
To track this serialization and deserialization support, refer to this issue [2].
[1] https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/proto3#any
[2] #21756
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

commit.message: support anydata in the generation process

add new line to anydata.proto

Co-Authored-By: Danesh Kuruppu <daneshk@users.noreply.github.com>
